org.usb4java.javax.descriptors

Class SimpleUsbEndpointDescriptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.usb4java.javax.descriptors.SimpleUsbDescriptor
      • org.usb4java.javax.descriptors.SimpleUsbEndpointDescriptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, javax.usb.UsbDescriptor, javax.usb.UsbEndpointDescriptor

    public final class SimpleUsbEndpointDescriptor
extends SimpleUsbDescriptor
implements javax.usb.UsbEndpointDescriptor
    Simple USB endpoint descriptor.
    Author:
    Klaus Reimer (k@ailis.de)
    See Also:

                           byte bDescriptorType,
                           byte bEndpointAddress,
                           byte bmAttributes,
                           short wMaxPacketSize,
                           byte bInterval)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        bLength - The descriptor length.
        bDescriptorType - The descriptor type.
        bEndpointAddress - The address of the endpoint.
        bmAttributes - The endpoint attributes.
        wMaxPacketSize - The maximum packet size.
        bInterval - The poll interval.

        Parameters:
